Game.Name: Hajime no Ippo - The Fighting! (Japan)
Game.plot: This is an English patch for the GBA game "Hajime no Ippo", a boxing game that is apparently like Punch Out, but with Hajime no Ippo characters and special moves. It also has an interesting Customization system. While choices are limited, it does prolong the game.The patch is complete, with the exception of voices. There are no known issues at the moment.http://www.romhacking.net/trans/1319/Cheat: Unlock Different Title Screen ThemeComplete Story Mode by either defeating Date or Sendo in the championship match. You will notice on the Title Screen a different music theme.Cheat: Unlock Different Title Screen ThemeLose to Eiji Date in story mode, and beat the rest of story mode to unlock Shigeta for use in Tournament mode/Customize mode.
Game.Notes: Boxing game based on the Japanese anime of the same name.
